Name: cold-induced sweating syndrome 1
Definition: A cold-induced sweating syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the CRLF1 gene on chromosome 19p13 and is characterized in the neonatal period by orofacial weakness with impaired sucking and swallowing resulting in poor feeding necessitating medical intervention.

Name: cold-induced sweating syndrome 2
Definition: A cold-induced sweating syndrome that has_material_basis_in compound heterozygous mutation in the CLCF1 gene on chromosome 11q13.

Name: cold-induced sweating syndrome 3
Definition: A cold-induced sweating syndrome that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the KLHL7 gene on chromosome 7p15.
